section.title: Overview
section.description: The Wait Dialog - Set Percentage action is used with a Wait Dialog - Open action of style "Percent" to indicate the progress of a process.

step.description: Enter a name for the wait dialog created in the Wait Dialog - Open action in the Identifier field.
Enter the Total number of steps.
Optionally, enter the Title of the dialog.
Optionally, enter a message to the user in the Top Message field.
Optionally, if the number of message lines is greater than 1, enter a message to the user in the Bottom Message field.
Optionally, enter a comment that describes the action.
